en.bdb: BY THY GRACE PAADHARI STANZA

pu.ss: qyrI ikRpw nwl: pwDVI CMd:
pu.bdb: qyrI ikRpw nwl: pwDVI CMd:

en.bdb: I relate to thee all the thoughts, O Gurudeva (Or O Gurudeva )

pu.ss: hy dyv! qusIN ieh sB ivcwr pUrvk dso
pu.bdb: hy dyv! qusIN ieh sB ivcwr pUrvk dso

en.bdb: Tell me all the musings) how the Creator created the expanse of the world?

pu.ss: ik krqy ny (swrI isRStI dw) pswr ikvyW kIqw hY?
pu.bdb: ik krqy ny (swrI isRStI dw) pswr ikvyW kIqw hY?

en.bdb: Although the Lord is Elementless, Fearless and Infinite, !

pu.ss: BwvyW (auh) BOiqk q`qÍw qoN pry, BY-rihq Aqy byAMq hY
pu.bdb: BwvyW (auh) BOiqk q`qÍw qoN pry, BY-rihq Aqy byAMq hY

verses.gurmukhi: qau kho jQw mq qRYx qMq ]1]231]

en.bdb: Then how did He extend the texture of this world? 1.231.

pu.ss: qw vI AwpxI ijho ijhI bu`DI hY, aus dI ivvsQw dsdw hw ]1]231]
pu.bdb: qw vI AwpxI ijho ijhI bu`DI hY, aus dI ivvsQw dsdw hw ]1]231]

transliteration.en: tau kaho jathaa mat train ta(n)t ||1||231||
transliteration.hi: तउ कहो जथा मत त्रैण तंत ॥१॥२३१॥
transliteration.ur: تا کهو جتھا مت ترَےݨ تںت ۔۔۱۔۔۲۳۱۔۔

en.bdb: He is the Doer, Beneficent, Mighty and Merciful !

pu.ss: (auh prmwqmw sB dw) krqw hY, bKiSS krn vwlw hY, SkqI vwlw hY, ikRpwlU hY,
pu.bdb: (auh prmwqmw sB dw) krqw hY, bKiSS krn vwlw hY, SkqI vwlw hY, ikRpwlU hY,

en.bdb: He is Non-dual, Non-Elemental, Fearless and Benign.

pu.ss: AdÍYq rUp hY, q`qÍw dI rcnw qoN pry hY, fr qoN rihq hY, dieAw krn vwlw hY,
pu.bdb: AdÍYq rUp hY, q`qÍw dI rcnw qoN pry hY, fr qoN rihq hY, dieAw krn vwlw hY,

en.bdb: He is the Donor, Endless and devoid of sufferings and blemishes.!

pu.ss: byAMq dwqw hY, duKw-doKw qoN rihq hY,
pu.bdb: byAMq dwqw hY, duKw-doKw qoN rihq hY,

verses.gurmukhi: ijh nyiq nyiq sB byd khq ]2]232]

en.bdb: All the Vedas call Him ‘Neti, Neti’ (Not this, Not thisl….Infinite).2.232.

pu.ss: ijs nUM swry vyd byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn ]2]232]
pu.bdb: ijs nUM swry vyd byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn ]2]232]

transliteration.en: jeh net net sabh bedh kahat ||2||232||
transliteration.hi: जिह नेति नेति सभ बेद कहत ॥२॥२३२॥
transliteration.ur: جِه نےت نےت سبھ بےد کهت ۔۔۲۔۔۲۳۲۔۔

en.bdb: He hath Created many beings in upper and lower regions.!

pu.ss: (aus ny) keI aucy qy nIvyW bxwau bxwey hn,
pu.bdb: (aus ny) keI aucy qy nIvyW bxwau bxwey hn,

verses.gurmukhi: sB vwr pwr jw ko pRBwau ]

en.bdb: His Glory is spread in all places here and there.

pu.ss: aurwr pwr (ausy dw) pRBwv hY,
pu.bdb: aurwr pwr (ausy dw) pRBwv hY,

transliteration.en: sabh vaar paar jaa ko prabhaau ||
transliteration.hi: सभ वार पार जा को प्रभाउ ॥
transliteration.ur: سبھ وار پار جا کو پربھاا ۔۔

en.bdb: All the being and creatures know Him. O foolish mind!

pu.ss: jo swry jIvw jMqUAW dI giqivDI nUM jwxdw hY।
pu.bdb: jo swry jIvw jMqUAW dI giqivDI nUM jwxdw hY।

verses.gurmukhi: mn mUV ikau n syvMq qwih ]3]233]

en.bdb: Why dost thou not remember Him? 3.233.

pu.ss: (hy) mUrK mn! (iPr) aus nUM ikauW nhIN ismrdw ]3]233]
pu.bdb: (hy) mUrK mn! (iPr) aus nUM ikauW nhIN ismrdw ]3]233]

transliteration.en: man mooR kiau na seva(n)t taeh ||3||233||
transliteration.hi: मन मूड़ किउ न सेवंत ताहि ॥३॥२३३॥
transliteration.ur: من مُوڑ کا ن سےوںت تاه ۔۔۳۔۔۲۳۳۔۔

en.bdb: Many fools worship the leaves (of Tulsi plant). !

pu.ss: keI mUrK (ibl jw qulsI dy) p`qrw nwl (aus dI) pUjw krdy hn;
pu.bdb: keI mUrK (ibl jw qulsI dy) p`qrw nwl (aus dI) pUjw krdy hn;

en.bdb: Many adepts and saints adore the Sun.

pu.ss: keI is`D swDk sUrj dI syvw krdy hn;
pu.bdb: keI is`D swDk sUrj dI syvw krdy hn;

en.bdb: Many prostrate towards the west (opposite side of sunrise)!

pu.ss: keI sUrj dy ault (p`Cm) vl isjdw krdy hn;
pu.bdb: keI sUrj dy ault (p`Cm) vl isjdw krdy hn;

verses.gurmukhi: pRB eyk rUp dÍY kY lKwie ]4]234]

en.bdb: They consider the Lord as dual, who is actually one!4. 234

pu.ss: pRBU qw iek rUp vwlw hY, (iPr aus nUM) dÍYq rUp ivc ikvyW vyiKAw jw skdw hY ]4]234]
pu.bdb: pRBU qw iek rUp vwlw hY, (iPr aus nUM) dÍYq rUp ivc ikvyW vyiKAw jw skdw hY ]4]234]

transliteration.en: prabh ek roop dhavai kai lakhai ||4||234||
transliteration.hi: प्रभ एक रूप द्वै कै लखाइ ॥४॥२३४॥
transliteration.ur: پربھ اےک رُوپ دوَے کَے لکھاا ۔۔۴۔۔۲۳۴۔۔

en.bdb: His Glory is Unassailable and His illumination is devoid of fear!

pu.ss: (auh pRBU) nw iC`jx vwly qyj vwlw hY Aqy auh suqh-is`D pRkwiSq hox vwlw hY;
pu.bdb: (auh pRBU) nw iC`jx vwly qyj vwlw hY Aqy auh suqh-is`D pRkwiSq hox vwlw hY;

en.bdb: He is Infinite Donor, Non-dual and Indestructible

pu.ss: byAMq dwqw hY, AdÍYq srUp Aqy nwS-rihq hY;
pu.bdb: byAMq dwqw hY, AdÍYq srUp Aqy nwS-rihq hY;

verses.gurmukhi: sB rog sog qy rhq rUp ]

en.bdb: He is an Entity devoid of all ailments and sorrows!

pu.ss: auh sB rogw sogw qoN rihq rUp vwlw hY;
pu.bdb: auh sB rogw sogw qoN rihq rUp vwlw hY;

transliteration.en: sabh rog sog te rahat roop ||
transliteration.hi: सभ रोग सोग ते रहत रूप ॥
transliteration.ur: سبھ روگ سوگ تے رهت رُوپ ۔۔

en.bdb: He is Fearless, Immortal and Invincible Entity!5. 235

pu.ss: BY-rihq, kwl-rihq, nwS-rihq srUp vwlw hY ]5]235]
pu.bdb: BY-rihq, kwl-rihq, nwS-rihq srUp vwlw hY ]5]235]

en.bdb: He is treasure of sympathy and perfectly Merciful!

pu.ss: (auh) ikRpw dw ^zwnw hY, pUrn ikRpwlU hY,
pu.bdb: (auh) ikRpw dw ^zwnw hY, pUrn ikRpwlU hY,

en.bdb: He the Donor and Merciful Lord removes all sufferings and blemishes

pu.ss: duK-doK nUM nSt krn vwlw hY, idAwlU dwqw hY,
pu.bdb: duK-doK nUM nSt krn vwlw hY, idAwlU dwqw hY,

en.bdb: He is without the impact of maya and is an Infrangible!

pu.ss: mwieAw qoN rihq Aqy Atu`t suAwmI hY।
pu.bdb: mwieAw qoN rihq Aqy Atu`t suAwmI hY।

en.bdb: Lord, His Glory pervades in water and on land and is the companion of all!6. 236

pu.ss: (aus dw) jl-Ql ivc pRBwv hY Aqy sB nwl (rmx krn vwlw) hY ]6]236]
pu.bdb: (aus dw) jl-Ql ivc pRBwv hY Aqy sB nwl (rmx krn vwlw) hY ]6]236]

verses.gurmukhi: ijh jwq pwq nhI Byd Brm ]

en.bdb: He is without caste, lineage, contrast and illusion,!

pu.ss: ijs dI koeI jwiq, brwdrI Aqy Brm Byd nhIN;
pu.bdb: ijs dI koeI jwiq, brwdrI Aqy Brm Byd nhIN;

transliteration.en: jeh jaat paat nahee bhedh bharam ||
transliteration.hi: जिह जात पात नही भेद भरम ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه جات پات نهیِ بھےد بھرم ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh rMg rUp nhI eyk Drm ]

en.bdb: He is without colour, form and special religious discipline

pu.ss: ijs dw koeI rMgrU p nhIN hY Aqy kyvl ieko hI Drm (krq`v) vwlw hY।
pu.bdb: ijs dw koeI rMgrU p nhIN hY Aqy kyvl ieko hI Drm (krq`v) vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: jeh ra(n)g roop nahee ek dharam ||
transliteration.hi: जिह रंग रूप नही एक धरम ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه رںگ رُوپ نهیِ اےک دھرم ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh sqRü imqR doaU eyk swr ]

en.bdb: For Him the enemies and friends are the same!

pu.ss: ijs leI vYrI Aqy imqr dovyW iek-smwn hn।
pu.bdb: ijs leI vYrI Aqy imqr dovyW iek-smwn hn।

transliteration.en: jeh satr mitr dhouoo ek saar ||
transliteration.hi: जिह सत्रु मित्र दोऊ एक सार ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه سترü متر دواُو اےک سار ۔۔

en.bdb: His invincible form is Everlasting and Infinite!7. 237

pu.ss: (aus dw) srUp nwS-rihq, Apwr Aqy siQr hY ]7]237]
pu.bdb: (aus dw) srUp nwS-rihq, Apwr Aqy siQr hY ]7]237]

verses.gurmukhi: jwnI n jwie ijh rUp ryK ]

en.bdb: His form and mark cannot be known!

pu.ss: ijs dI rUp-ryKw jwxI nhIN jwdI।
pu.bdb: ijs dI rUp-ryKw jwxI nhIN jwdI।

transliteration.en: jaanee na jai jeh roop rekh ||
transliteration.hi: जानी न जाइ जिह रूप रेख ॥
transliteration.ur: جانیِ ن جاا جه رُوپ رےکھ ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kih bwsu qwsu kih kaunu ByK ]

en.bdb: Where doth He live? And what is His garb?

pu.ss: aus dw vws ikQy hY, aus dw Bys ikhVw hY,
pu.bdb: aus dw vws ikQy hY, aus dw Bys ikhVw hY,

transliteration.en: keh baas taas keh kaun bhekh ||
transliteration.hi: कहि बासु तासु कहि कउनु भेख ॥
transliteration.ur: کهِ باس تاس کهِ کان بھےکھ ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kih nwm qws hY kvn jwq ]

en.bdb: What is His Name? and what is His caste?

pu.ss: aus dw nwm kI hY Aqy aus dI jwiq kI hY? (aus bwry kuJ nhIN ikhw jw skdw)
pu.bdb: aus dw nwm kI hY Aqy aus dI jwiq kI hY? (aus bwry kuJ nhIN ikhw jw skdw)

transliteration.en: keh naam taas hai kavan jaat ||
transliteration.hi: कहि नाम तास है कवन जात ॥
transliteration.ur: کهِ نام تاس هَے کون جات ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh sqRü imqR nhI puqR BRwq ]8]238]

en.bdb: He is without any enemy, friend, son and brother!8. 238

pu.ss: ijs dw nw koeI vYrI hY, nw imqr hY, nw pu`qr Aqy Brw hY ]8]238]
pu.bdb: ijs dw nw koeI vYrI hY, nw imqr hY, nw pu`qr Aqy Brw hY ]8]238]

transliteration.en: jeh satr mitr nahee putr bhraat ||8||238||
transliteration.hi: जिह सत्रु मित्र नही पुत्र भ्रात ॥८॥२३८॥
transliteration.ur: جِه سترü متر نهیِ پُتر بھرات ۔۔۸۔۔۲۳۸۔۔

en.bdb: He is the treasure of Mercy and the cause of all causes!

pu.ss: (auh) ikRpw dw ^zwnw hY (Aqy swrI isRStI dw) kwrn srUp hY;
pu.bdb: (auh) ikRpw dw ^zwnw hY (Aqy swrI isRStI dw) kwrn srUp hY;

verses.gurmukhi: ijh ckR ichn nhI rMg rUp ]

en.bdb: He hath no mark, sign, colour and form

pu.ss: ijs dw koeI icMnH-c`kr Aqy rUp-rMg nhIN hY;
pu.bdb: ijs dw koeI icMnH-c`kr Aqy rUp-rMg nhIN hY;

transliteration.en: jeh chakr chihan nahee ra(n)g roop ||
transliteration.hi: जिह चक्र चिहन नही रंग रूप ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه چکر چهن نهیِ رںگ رُوپ ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh Kyd Byd nhI krm kwl ]

en.bdb: He is without suffering, action and death!

pu.ss: jo Kyd, Byd, kwl Aqy krm qoN pry hY;
pu.bdb: jo Kyd, Byd, kwl Aqy krm qoN pry hY;

transliteration.en: jeh khedh bhedh nahee karam kaal ||
transliteration.hi: जिह खेद भेद नही करम काल ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه کھےد بھےد نهیِ کرم کال ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sB jIv jMq kI krq pwl ]9]239]

en.bdb: He is the Sustainer of all the beings and creatures!9. 239

pu.ss: jo sB jIv-jMqUAW dI pwlnw krdw hY ]9]239]
pu.bdb: jo sB jIv-jMqUAW dI pwlnw krdw hY ]9]239]

transliteration.en: sabh jeev ja(n)t kee karat paal ||9||239||
transliteration.hi: सभ जीव जंत की करत पाल ॥९॥२३९॥
transliteration.ur: سبھ جیِو جںت کیِ کرت پال ۔۔۹۔۔۲۳۹۔۔

en.bdb: He is the loftiest, biggest and Perfect Entity!

pu.ss: jo aucwx-nIvwx (vwD-Gwt) qoN ibnw Aqy is`D (kwml) srUp vwlw hY;
pu.bdb: jo aucwx-nIvwx (vwD-Gwt) qoN ibnw Aqy is`D (kwml) srUp vwlw hY;

en.bdb: His intellect is boundless and is unique in warfare

pu.ss: (auh) Apwr bu`DI vwlw Aqy AnUp Xu`D krn vwlw hY;
pu.bdb: (auh) Apwr bu`DI vwlw Aqy AnUp Xu`D krn vwlw hY;

verses.gurmukhi: ijh rUp ryK nhI rMg rwg ]

en.bdb: He is without form, line, colour and affection!

pu.ss: ijs dw koeI rUp, ryKw Aqy rwg-rMg nhIN hY;
pu.bdb: ijs dw koeI rUp, ryKw Aqy rwg-rMg nhIN hY;

transliteration.en: jeh roop rekh nahee ra(n)g raag ||
transliteration.hi: जिह रूप रेख नही रंग राग ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه رُوپ رےکھ نهیِ رںگ راگ ۔۔

en.bdb: His Glory is Unassailable, Unappeasable and stainless!10. 240

pu.ss: (ijs dw) qyj nw iC`jx vwlw Aqy jo nw pRBwivq hox vwlw hY Aqy nw hI klMikq hox vwlw hY ]10]240]
pu.bdb: (ijs dw) qyj nw iC`jx vwlw Aqy jo nw pRBwivq hox vwlw hY Aqy nw hI klMikq hox vwlw hY ]10]240]

verses.gurmukhi: jl Ql mhIp bn qn durMq ]

en.bdb: He is the king of waters and lands; He, the Infinite Lord pervades the forests and the blades of grass!;

pu.ss: (auh) jl-Ql dw rwjw Aqy bnw qy SrIrw ivc byAMq (rUp ivc psirAw hoieAw hY);
pu.bdb: (auh) jl-Ql dw rwjw Aqy bnw qy SrIrw ivc byAMq (rUp ivc psirAw hoieAw hY);

transliteration.en: jal thal maheep ban tan dhura(n)t ||
transliteration.hi: जल थल महीप बन तन दुरंत ॥
transliteration.ur: جل تھل مهیِپ بن تن دُرںت ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh nyiq nyiq ins idn aucrMq ]

en.bdb: He is called ‘Neti, Neti’ (Not this, Not this…Infinite) night and day

pu.ss: ijs nUM rwq-idn byAMq byAMq khIdw hY।
pu.bdb: ijs nUM rwq-idn byAMq byAMq khIdw hY।

transliteration.en: jeh net net nis dhin uchara(n)t ||
transliteration.hi: जिह नेति नेति निस दिन उचरंत ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه نےت نےت نس دن اُچرںت ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pwieE n jwie ijh pYr pwr ]

en.bdb: His limits cannot be known!

pu.ss: ijs dw dUjw kMFw ('pwr') nhIN pwieAw jw skdw।
pu.bdb: ijs dw dUjw kMFw ('pwr') nhIN pwieAw jw skdw।

transliteration.en: paio na jai jeh pair paar ||
transliteration.hi: पाइओ न जाइ जिह पैर पार ॥
transliteration.ur: پاااو ن جاا جه پَےر پار ۔۔

en.bdb: He, the Generous Lord, burns the blemishes of the lowly!11. 241

pu.ss: auh audwr srUp vwlw dInw-duKIAW dw doK hrn vwlw hY ]11]241]
pu.bdb: auh audwr srUp vwlw dInw-duKIAW dw doK hrn vwlw hY ]11]241]

en.bdb: Millions of Indras are at His service!

pu.ss: ijs dy keI kroVw ieMdr pwxI Brdy hn (syvw krdy hn);
pu.bdb: ijs dy keI kroVw ieMdr pwxI Brdy hn (syvw krdy hn);

en.bdb: Millions of the Yogi Rudras (Shivas stand at His Gate)

pu.ss: keI kroV rudr aus dy duAwr nwl juVy hoey hn;
pu.bdb: keI kroV rudr aus dy duAwr nwl juVy hoey hn;

en.bdb: Many Ved Vyas and innumerable Brahmas!

pu.ss: keI vydivAws Aqy bySumwr bRhmw
pu.bdb: keI vydivAws Aqy bySumwr bRhmw

verses.gurmukhi: ijh nyq nyq ins idn aucrMq ]12]242]

en.bdb: Utter the words ‘Neti, Neti’ about Him, night and day!12. 242

pu.ss: ijs nUM rwq idn byAMq byAMq (kih ky) aucwrdy hn ]12]242]
pu.bdb: ijs nUM rwq idn byAMq byAMq (kih ky) aucwrdy hn ]12]242]

transliteration.en: jeh net net nis dhin uchara(n)t ||12||242||
transliteration.hi: जिह नेत नेत निस दिन उचरंत ॥१२॥२४२॥
transliteration.ur: جِه نےت نےت نس دن اُچرںت ۔۔۱۲۔۔۲۴۲۔۔
